name: Tom Jones
introduction: Tom Jones (April 26, 1943 in Dallas, Texas  May 29, 2015 in Eastlake, Ohio) was a United States driver, born in Dallas, Texas.  He entered his own Cooper T82 in one Formula One race, the 1967 Canadian Grand Prix.  After a promising practice performance, he suffered electrical problems during qualifying and only set one very slow lap time.  The stewards denied him a place on the grid on the grounds that he was "too slow", even though he had been competitive in practice runs.
